rooms.description: Spacious area with Bohemian decor, natural lighting and open layout.
Cozy dining space that flows into the living room.
Modern kitchen with ample counter space and storage, designed following Vastu principles to ensure a harmonious energy flow.
Master bedroom with ample storage and natural ventilation, placed in the north-east direction to align with Vastu.
Secondary bedroom designed for additional space and privacy, incorporating Bohemian elements.
Private bathroom attached to the master bedroom.
Dedicated living space for domestic staff with basic amenities.

openings.description: Main entrance aligned in the north following Vastu norms to welcome positive energy.
Large windows for natural light and ventilation.
Access door to the two-car garage located on the west side of the villa.
